mapper.select: SELECT t_cost_card.`id` as id, t_dish.`name` AS name, t_dish.`id` AS dishId, t_dish.`assistant_code` AS assistantCode, t_cost_card.`cost_card_number` AS costCardNumber, t_cost_card.`main_cost` AS mainCost, t_cost_card.`assist_cost` AS assistCost, t_cost_card.`delicious_cost` AS deliciousCost, t_cost_card.`standard_cost` AS standardCost FROM t_cost_card LEFT JOIN t_dish ON t_dish.id = t_cost_card.dish_id WHERE t_cost_card.`id` = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE t_cost_card SET cost_card_number = #{costCard.costCardNumber}, main_cost = #{costCard.mainCost}, assist_cost = #{costCard.assistCost}, delicious_cost = #{costCard.deliciousCost}, standard_cost = #{costCard.standardCost} WHERE id = #{costCard.id}
